short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small Chrome Packaged App to stress a RESTful web service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RESTful Stress is a packaged app, for developers, that allows to test, check and stress a RESTful web service using a simple client invoke on HTTP verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE). 

How to use? It's really simple: just insert the address of RESTfull web service, select the HTTP verb, choose the number of iterations to execute, and....START!

What's new in version 1.6.0?
- Custom authentication header
- Support for "console.log" (for scenario mode)
- Performance improvements
- Updates from GitHub on Electron platform
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.5.0?
- Support for "x-www-form-encoded"
- Support for "form-data"
- Binary file to base-64 string converter
- Authentication token extraction (OAuth2)
- Response download
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.4.0?
- Scenario builder improvements
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.3.0?
- Basic Authorization Header Builder
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.2.0?
- Performance calculation panel
- Timeout on HTTP requests
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.1.0.0?
- Support for massive mode
- Download/upload history
- Download/upload settings
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.0.1.0?
- Support for custom scenarios
- Bug fixing

What's new in version 1.0.0.0?
- Brand new user interface, based on Bootstrap and FontAwesome
- Support for custom headers
- New JSON editor based on ACE
- Console and running state always visible on status bar
- Exports results on Excel format (CSV)
- Maximum, minimum and average duration
- Load & save settings
- Warm-up management

This is just an early preview version: please be so kind to report any bug or issue.

Enjoy...
